metadata.dc:author: Sanromá Ortueta, I
Garmendia Larrea, J C
Ruiz Díaz, I
López García, J A
Sanz Jaca, J P
Arocena Lanz, F
metadata.dc:description: A case of inflammatory malignant fibrous histiocytoma is described herein. We discuss its clinical features, therapeutic possibilities and diagnosis, highlighting the usefulness of magnetic resonance imaging as well as the importance of correct anatomopathological diagnosis.
metadata.dc:title: Histiocitoma fibroso maligno retroperitoneal tipo inflamatorio. A propósito de un caso.
[Malignant retroperitoneal fibrous histiocytoma of the inflammatory type. Apropos of a case].
